statements: SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT username, role FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT role, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM user_permissions;
SELECT username FROM user_permissions WHERE role IN ('admin', 'editor') ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT username, role FROM user_permissions WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'full_access' AND role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'view_only';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions WHERE description LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id LEFT JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT users.user_id, users.username, roles.role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id=user_roles.user_id INNER JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id=roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role = roles.role_name;

SELECT user_id, username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role = roles.role_name JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN permissions ON user_roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id;

SELECT username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY role DESC, username ASC;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.username = 'alice';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT count(*), r.role_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_name GROUP BY r.role_name;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'a%';
